name: Marble Maniac
description:
Endless runner inspired by Marble Madness for gameboy!

Controls: Gamepad is preferred or use WASD. Press space or gamepad button to jump! Press Alt+Enter to go fullscreen.

Rules: You start with 30 seconds. Coins give you 2 extra seconds and 10 points. 5 points for every section you complete. Watch out for bombs and evil marbles.

Features: Random course generator, ball physics, basic AI, high score auto save, attract mode, boot up sequence, 8 bit sound effects.
